hero.title: Cédric Famibelle-Pronzola
hero.subtitle: Web/Mobile Designer and Developer
hero.description: I design and develop modern, performant, and accessible web applications. Passionate about free and open source technologies.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hello ! I'm Cédric Famibelle-Pronzola, a Web/Mobile designer and developer with a passion for creating modern, high-performance web applications.
about.paragraph2: With a solid background in front-end and back-end development, I strive to create elegant and accessible solutions that meet users' needs.
about.paragraph3: As a committed free software advocate, I'm a strong proponent of free and open source software.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Discover a selection of my recent projects. Each project is an opportunity to learn and explore new technologies.

techStack.title: My Tech Stack
techStack.description: Here are the technologies and tools I use daily to create modern and performant web applications.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Have a project in mind or a question? Feel free to contact me. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
